author: Brad Larson
text: We preparing to update our 13 year old Comprehensive Plan.  We would like to incorporate the Comp Plan into the operations of the City, including the budget process.   Do you have examples of how your community has linked the budget to the Comp Plan?  For example, does your CIP take into account the Comp Plan?
title: Lining the Budget to the Comp Plan
